lender.name: Ruth

lender.name: Will
lender.loan_because:
Kiva is Win-Win on steroids!
Kiva personally permits me (1) to flexibly and effectively battle poverty (2) one on one (3) funding only the needy I can afford (4) using a revolving account (5) at little or no cost or even risk to me.
Kiva communily (5) builds and betters humanity (6) with small, humble endeavers (7) that enable my entrepreneurs to achieve a successful future for all.
I only regret that I cannot command more resources to personally brighten the eyes of every Kiva prospect I view who seeks only a very humble investment to resurrect his/her life one step at a time.
lender.occupational_info: Retired, disabled and modestly living alone in a trailer in a hot, sandy desert. How privileged I am to individually and intimately lighten--however slight--the dark cross of poverty from the shoulders of my entrepreneurs whose burden I have never experienced.

lender.name: cathy
lender.loan_because: We are all connected.

lender.name: Lorraine

lender.occupational_info: I record payments made to a newspaper and answer customers questions about thier bills

lender.name: Pierre
lender.loan_because: I've lived in third world countries and have seen extreme poverty first hand. My mother suffered under the khmer rouge, who annihilated Cambodia's once prosperous economy. I also believe market-based solutions to development to be the most sustainable and effective from an economic point of view, and that micro-finance is on the right track!
lender.occupational_info: I am currently studying management and economics. Eventually I hope to start my own business as well. And then it will be my turn to look for financing.. Maybe you can help me then, when you're wealthy? ;-)

lender.name: Ketari
lender.loan_because: Is the least we can do
lender.occupational_info: I work in a traditional bank that lends only to those who already have money

lender.name: Terry
lender.loan_because: As someone who has their own business, I like the idea of helping others make their business grow.
lender.occupational_info: I develop web sites for small business owners, solo-preneurs and non profit organizations.

lender.name: Suzanne
lender.loan_because: I believe that microfinance is an invaluable tool in developing businesses and economies across the globe, providing people in less advantaged situations the opportunity to provide for themselves and their families.

lender.name: Muneer
lender.loan_because: I want to help people raise themselves into affluence.

lender.name: Lindsay
lender.loan_because: "he who is kind to the poor lends to the Lord, and He will reward him for what he has done" (prov 19:17)
lender.occupational_info: I study Music, French, and African culture at New York University. I am also a musician - I write music, play guitar & violin, and sing!

lender.name: Miguel √Ångel
lender.loan_because: I think it is a very good way to make possible a long-term improvement around the world.
lender.occupational_info: I design computer applications for my regional goverment.

lender.name: Jen Grier
lender.occupation: Game Designer / Sound Designer / Tech Support
lender.loan_because: I like empowering people!
lender.occupational_info: I make sounds for video games and other interactive media. I'm also a composer and saxophonist.

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: I believe this is one area in which I can demonstrate God‚Äôs love to all people, by aiding those who need financial assistance, helping those who are in a time of need.
lender.occupational_info: I design and build things. Projects may include buildings, airports, shops, schools, restaurants, furniture, etc.

lender.name: Paul
lender.occupation: Physician(Homeo), Chairman of JEEVAN SAGAR TRUST.

lender.name: Mark
lender.loan_because: I like to help people in need find success.
lender.occupational_info: I sell services that help companies engage their customers and build their business.

lender.name: Nicholas MacGowan
lender.loan_because: Having lived in Africa, I know what a difference it can make. I also see it as a better way to help people in developing countries than charity. My hope is that entrepreneur can grow a sustainable business, and in the best case, even create jobs. Best of all, these people don‚Äôt feel like a charity case, they know they have to work hard to pay back the money. Having started several companies myself, I know what a difference that can make, not only to your self-esteem, but also to your work effort. Plus, knowing that others believe in you is a fantastic feeling.
lender.occupational_info: Currently, I work at twidox, which I co-founded. Twidox is a free, user generated online library of ‚Äòquality‚Äô documents and other media that allows individuals and organisations to easily publish, share and search for them.

lender.name: Andr√©
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Nicolas
lender.loan_because: Because I am fortunate enough to be able to. And the reason I can is because others believed in me first.
lender.occupational_info: We help people get published online through a network of various websites and than spread their messages throughout the globe.

lender.name: Arul Prasad
lender.occupational_info: I build software that educates kids to manage money effectively.

lender.name: Gretchen
lender.loan_because: Doing a small part do make the world a better place.

lender.name: Samuel
lender.loan_because: I believe in sharing the opportunities I have had with others.
lender.occupational_info: I provide consulting for credit unions.

lender.name: Xaris
lender.loan_because: It's in the Bible.

lender.name: Graham
lender.loan_because: I like the idea that I can make a difference in someone's life without a lot of mess or financial entanglements; a few bucks that I generally won't miss can make a huge impact for a family elsewhere. It's fast, it's easy, and it's good for the world.

lender.name: Kasidie.com
lender.loan_because: Entrepreneurs can reshape the society they live in; culturally, economically and - ultimately - politically.
lender.occupational_info: Favorite quote (from a Kipling poem): "I didn't begin with askings, I took my job and I stuck I took the chances they wouldn't And now they're calling it luck"

lender.name: Bob
lender.loan_because: Its easy, fun, and brilliant!!

lender.name: Lindsey
lender.loan_because: People that are trying, deserve opportunities
lender.occupational_info: My work involves helping women and children escape from violence and abuse.

lender.name: Sue
lender.loan_because: I like the idea that my business in the UK can help fund similar businesses worldwide.
lender.occupational_info: I sell newspapers.

lender.name: dcdani
lender.occupational_info: Web developer, computer graphics, 3d ... ^^

lender.name: Ausitn
lender.loan_because: God has blessed me with enough to share.

lender.name: brenda
lender.loan_because: everyone should have a chance to create their own success

lender.name: Belen
lender.loan_because: Somos la primera generaci√≥n capaz de erradicar la pobreza - We are the first generation that can end poverty.

lender.name: CloudCapture
lender.loan_because: A good idea, the drive to pull it off, and the funding to do so is the only thing that keeps society moving forward.

lender.name: Colleen
lender.loan_because: I can, I should.

lender.name: Marin
lender.loan_because: I don't have much money, but I want to try and help with the little cash I do have.
lender.occupational_info: Write about mobile phones.

lender.name: Olivier
lender.loan_because: I have been given a lot of advantages in my life. This is just a small way of starting to even it out.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a big TV company that makes big TV programs.

lender.name: Lyman
lender.loan_because: I want to.

lender.name: Jean
lender.loan_because: I believe in supporting people who are trying to improve their life situation.

lender.name: El Clinto
lender.loan_because: If you've ever wanted to give back, but didn't know where to start or how, this is the perfect solution. You can start loaning money today for as low as $25. Join today and feel happier during these rough economic times.
lender.occupational_info: I've had the privilege to travel and film and work with micro finance groups like Turame in Burundi, Africa and social justice groups like Faceless International in Kolkata, India. I wanted to start this group to continue the giving back to these types of programs. Join Team El Clinto!

lender.name: Joe L
lender.loan_because: ....I believe we are interconnected. I like the opportunity participate (in a small way) in an entrepreneur's progress. I like that it is a loan, and a loan once repaid I can use again to help another.
lender.occupational_info: Technology and business development
